mobiheader.fullname: Riot! The Bristol Bridge Massacre of 1793

exthheader.author: Manson, Michael
exthheader.description: Riot! illuminates a darker moment in Bristol's history and vividly recreates the dreadful sequence of events that led to the Bristol Bridge Massacre in 1793. Compellingly written and meticulously researched, Riot is presented in a lively and accessible style and is essential reading for anyone interested in local history or politics. This new edition contains an introduction by Steve Poole, Associate Professor of Social and Cultural History at the University of the West of England, Bristol.
exthheader.subject: Political activism; Somerset; Bristol
exthheader.updatedtitle: Riot!: The Bristol Bridge Massacre of 1793
